ygData.subject: Re: Page for sell
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/27/99 7:01:12 AM Eastern Daylight Time, cnj005@email.mot.com writes: Research items are now stackable. Read your patch messages.
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/27/99 7:01:12 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
cnj005@... writes:

Research items are now stackable. Read your patch messages.


<<
I reside on the Xegony server and I have recently found a "faded Velishoul's
Tome Page", I've never seen this item before, nor anything of it's kind,
because it's stackable. Everyone tells me that it is an enchanter's research
item, but i don't honestly believe that because it can be stacked. My
question's are:

1) is this an enchanter research item?
2) if not then what is it for?
3) is this item rare?
4) what would someone pay for this item?
>>
